column2: "Na Farisiifo no nye kyerɛwfo bi a wofi Jerusalɛm bae behyiaa ne nkyɛn
column4: "na wohun dɛ n’esuafo no bi dze nsa a ho nntsew
column5: ɔno nye dɛ nsa a wɔannhohor ho

column2: "(Na Farisiifo no nye Jewfo nyina
column3: sɛ wɔannhohor hɔn nsa ho yie a
column5: na wokitsa mpanyimfo atsetsesɛm no mu;"

column2: "na sɛ wofi gua do ba
column3: na wɔannhohor hɔnho a
column5: na ndzɛmba pii ka ho a wɔagye dɛ wobosuo mu
column6: nkɔɔpow nye nhina nye nyewasɛn ho hohor.)"

column2: "Na Farisiifo no nye kyerɛwfo no bisaa no dɛ
column3: Ebɛnadze ntsi na w’esuafo nnantsew mpanyimfo atsetsesɛm no do
column4: na wɔdze nsa a ho nntsew dzidzi yi?"

column2: "Na ɔsee hɔn dɛ
column3: Isaia hyɛɛ hom ndabrabafo ho nkɔm yie dɛ  (dɛ mbrɛ wɔakyerɛw no)
column4: Ɔman yi dze hɔn anofamfa dzi me nyi

column2: "Na wɔsɔr me gyan
column3: Wɔkyerɛkyerɛ nkyerɛkyerɛ a ɔyɛ nyimpa ahyɛdze."

column2: "Hom egya Nyankopɔn ne mbra hɔ: na hom esuo nyimpa atsetsesɛm mu."
"Na ɔkɔr do see hɔn dɛ
column3: Hom pow Nyankopɔn ne mbra no papaara pi
column4: ama hom eedzi hom atsetsesɛm do."

column2: "Na Moses kaa dɛ
column3: Dzi w’egya nye wo na nyi
column5: Obiara a ɔhyɛ egya anaa na ahorba no

column2: "naaso hom dze
column3: hom se dɛ
column4: Sɛ nyimpa bi se n’egya anaa ne na dɛ
column5: biribiara a nkyɛ edze benya mo ho mfaso no yɛ Korban (ɔnye dɛ
column6: Akyɛdze a ɔyɛ Nyankopɔn dze) a

column2: "ɔno hom mma no kwan dɛ mma ɔnnyɛ biribi mma n’egya anaa ne na bio:"
"ɔnam hom atsetsesɛm a hom dze bae no do
column3: hom amma Nyankopɔn asɛm enntsim; na ndzɛmba a ɔtse dɛm pii na hom yɛ."

column2: "Na ɔfrɛɛ nyimpadodow no baa ne nkyɛn bio no
column3: ɔsee hɔn dɛ
column4: Hom nyina ntsie me na hom ntse ase:"

column2: "biribiara nnyi nyimpa ho a ɔkɔ no mu a obotum egu no ho fi; na dza ofi nyimpa mu ba no
column3: ɔno na ogu nyimpa ho fi."

column2: "Sɛ obiara wɔ aso a wɔdze tsie a
column3: wɔmma ontsie."

column2: "Na ofii nyimpadodow no nkyɛn kɔr fie no
column3: n’esuafo no bisaa no bɛ no ase."

column2: "Na ɔsee hɔn dɛ
column3: Ana hom so nnyi ntseasee dɛm? Ana hom nnhu dɛ biribiara a ofi nyimpa ho kɔ no mu no
column8: na okeyi gu egyanan mu.  [Ɔkaa yi dze tseew edziban nyina ho.]"

column2: "Na ɔsee dɛ
column3: Dza ofi nyimpa no mu ba no

column2: "Na nyimpa akoma mu
column3: na adwembɔn fi ba

column2: "ndzebɔn yinom nyina fi mu na ɔba na ogu nyimpa ho fi."
"Na ɔsoɛree fii hɔ kɔr Taere nye Sidon ntoaado. Na ɔkɔr fi bi mu
column3: na ɔammpɛ dɛ obiara tse

column2: "Na ntsɛmara ɔbaa bi a ne babaa kakraba wɔ sunsum fi tsee ne nka no
column3: ɔbae bɔhwee n’ananadze."

column2: "Na ɔbaa no yɛ Griiknyi
column3: na n’awoo mu ɔyɛ Sirofonisianyi; na ɔserɛɛ no dɛ ontu sunsum fi no mfi ne babaa no mu."

column2: "Na Jesus see no dɛ
column3: Ma mba no mmee ansaana
column4: na ɔnnsɛ dɛ wɔfa mba edziban tow ma mbɔdɔm."

column2: "Na obuae see no dɛ
column3: Mo wura
column4: ɔyɛ nokwar dze; naaso pon ase mbɔdɔm no
column5: wodzi mba hɔn mporoporoba no bi."

column2: "Na Jesus see no dɛ
column3: Asɛm a aka yi ntsi kɔ: sunsum fi no efi wo babaa no mu."

column2: "Na osii mu kɔr ne fie no
column3: ohun dɛ abofraba no da mpa do
column4: na sunsum fi no efi no mu kɔ."

column2: "Na ofii Taere ntoaado bio koduaa Sidon mu dze faa Dekapolis ntoaado ne finimfin baa Galilii po ho."
"Na wɔdze otsitsifo a ɔpo dodow brɛɛ no
column3: na wɔserɛɛ no dɛ ɔmfa ne nsa nto no do."

column2: "Na ɔdze no fii nyimpadodow no mu kɔr nkyɛn na ɔdze ne nsatseaba hyɛɛ n’asowa mu
column3: na ɔtoo ntafi dze kaa ne tɛkyerɛma
column5: "na ɔhwɛɛ sor sii nkrum see no dɛ
column10: "Na n’aso buebuei na ne tɛkyerɛma ase ahoma sanee

column2: "Na ɔbraa hɔn dɛ mma wɔnnka nnkyerɛ obiara; na mpɛn dodow a ɔbraa hɔn no
column3: mpɛn dodow a wɔdze tahyee kɛse nye no."

column2: "Na ɔyɛɛ hɔn ahobow mbordo
column3: na wɔsee dɛ
column4: Ɔayɛ ndzɛmba nyina yie: ɔma tsitsifo tse asɛm na ɔma mmum kasa."
